choice_rationales.Intervention outside scope or premature: Does not best address immediate risk.
choice_rationales.Comfort-focused but unsafe response: Does not best address immediate risk.
choice_rationales.Action that delays escalation: Does not best address immediate risk.

stem: Which findings require immediate nursing action in this Med-Surg case? (Select all that apply.)
rationale: Only findings indicating acute deterioration or safety risk warrant immediate intervention.

stem: Complete the bowtie using the case information.
rationale: Bowtie requires identifying the most dangerous problem, acting, and predicting improvement.
